title: buildDeferredActionDigest
description: Overview of the buildDeferredActionDigest method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/smart-accounts/functions/buildDeferredActionDigest
---

Creates the digest which must be prepended to the userOp signature.

Assumption: The client this extends is used to sign the typed data.

## Import

```ts
import { buildDeferredActionDigest } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### params

`BuildDeferredActionDigestParams`

- The parameters for building the deferred action digest.

## Returns

`Hex`
The encoded digest to be prepended to the userOp signature.
